synopsis.text:
Erste Empire, a formidable military government, seeks to dominate a world filled with floating islands scattered across the vast skies. Amidst these islands lies Zinkenstill, a mysterious island home to a young boy named Gran and his talking winged lizard companion, Vyrn. One fateful day, they encounter Lyria, a girl on the run from the Empire.

With the Empire hot on their heels, Gran and Lyria embark on a daring adventure through the skies, guided by a letter Gran's father left behind. The letter promises a reunion at Estalucia, the Island of the Astrals (or Stars, as some call it). As they journey together, they unravel the many mysteries of their world, all while evading the relentless grasp of the Empire. Join Gran, Lyria, and Vyrn as they take flight in this thrilling anime, filled with friendship, danger, and the pursuit of freedom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
